name: Apidya
description:
Revenge is sweet when it's the life of your lover at stake....

After the vile sorceror, Hexaa, has tortured your beloved partner to near-death, you awake the magic of your grandfather's talisman to summon the forces of light and help you defeat the sorceror and find a life-saving antidote. You are Ikuro and you are the only one who can commit the neccessary deeds - live off your wits, live off your instinct, but above all, life off your sacred love for Yuri.

As the ancient talisman transforms you into a beautiful bee, such beauty is darkened by the burning passion to hurt, maim and destroy Hexaa and his evil army of insects and wildlife. Your insect bite is deadly.... but are you?
